dcterms:creator: Hannu J Aronen
dcterms:description: The IMPROD dataset contains samples of multi-parametric magnetic resonance images (mp-MRI), biomarkers, segmentation masks, and lesion scores for 157 men with prostate cancer, aimed at improving prostate cancer diagnosis.
dcterms:title: IMPROD Dataset

dcterms:description: ProstateX is a dataset used for clinical significance classification of prostate cancer lesions, providing a platform for evaluating automated methods.
dcterms:title: ProstateX

dcterms:description: ProstateX2 is a dataset used for lesion detection in prostate cancer, facilitating the development and evaluation of automated detection methods.
dcterms:title: ProstateX2

dcterms:creator: Davood Karimi
Golnoosh Samei
Yanan Shao
Septimiu Salcudean
dcterms:description: PROMISE12 is a dataset focused on prostate segmentation in T2-weighted magnetic resonance imaging, providing a benchmark for evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: PROMISE12

dcterms:creator: Patrick Schelb
Simon Kohl
Jan Philipp Radtke
Manuel Wiesenfarth
Philipp Kickingereder
Sebastian Bickelhaupt
Tristan Anselm Kuder
Albrecht Stenzinger
Markus Hohenfellner
Heinz-Peter Schlemmer
Klaus H. Maier-Hein
David Bonekamp
dcterms:description: The Prostate Cancer Dataset provides a comprehensive evaluation of deep learning methods for classifying cancer at prostate MRI, comparing automated methods against clinical assessments.
dcterms:title: Prostate Cancer Dataset
